meanings.definition: A place where drugs are prepared and sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the apotheces to buy some medicine for my headache.
meanings.sent2: The apotheces on the corner always has a long line of customers.
meanings.sent3: The apotheces had a sale on herbal remedies, so I stocked up on teas.
meanings.sent4: The apotheces was a treasure trove of healing potions and remedies.
meanings.sent5: The apotheces smelled of various herbs and medicines, creating a comforting atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A person who prepares and sells drugs.
meanings.sent1: The apotheces behind the counter greeted me warmly.
meanings.sent2: The apotheces recommended a new ointment for my skin condition.
meanings.sent3: The apotheces joked that their potions could cure anything, even a broken heart.
meanings.sent4: The apotheces was like a wizard, mixing ingredients to create magical remedies.
meanings.sent5: The apotheces had a kind smile, making customers feel at ease with their expertise.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing and selling drugs.
meanings.sent1: The apotheces required precision and care in every step of the process.
meanings.sent2: The apotheces involved in creating herbal remedies had a deep knowledge of plants.
meanings.sent3: The apotheces turned the art of potion-making into a profitable business.
meanings.sent4: The apotheces of old times would travel far and wide to gather rare ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The apotheces put their heart and soul into each remedy, ensuring quality and effectiveness.
